title: So I realised that the new WW is designed by my arch-nemesis....
body:
**CertainlyT**.

And it kinda shows in the design, considering WW now has double utility/function in many of his skills.

This guy really is working on the wrong genre imho, he should be working on games like Battlerite or something such as brawler or beat'em-up games rather than an ARTS/MOBA genre.

EDIT: To prevent confusion, it's not that I see the new WW as badly designed or overloaded like most of the other champs he'd made, I actually see the new WW as an improvement than the guy's usual. I'm just being the skeptic guy here, picking on that he's still using button loading to design champions, which I really would like to see him working on either reducing or at least make it meaningful than just being a pile of checklists; and I guess WW is the first step towards that, which is okay.

True, I didn't notice as much in the new WW by the looks of it either. I guess it comes down to the fact while many of his abilities now has double-cast, each of their effect isn't over-the-roof loaded or that they cover every aspect possible in the kit. WW comes off as a more "natural" champ if you know what I mean.

Still, it's a bit bummer to still see the "press every button" signature approach of CertainlyT whenever he wants to put a champion together, I wish he could work on that for the better in future.

Don't get me wrong, this thread wasn't actually made to bash him, as new WW doesn't seem too bad really, I'm just pushing out some skepticism considering the badwater I've had with this guy.

We all hope it's a new and positive start for this guy.

tbh the only part that makes him seem a bit overloaded is his bloodscents active portion the rest is fairly similar to how he plays now and the fear is fine.

Edit:Looking now

His passive is fairly similar (magic dmg on hit and healing) the only difference is the amount he heals goes up significantly when he is low hp.

His Q is fairly similar except with added mobility (which he needs to gank pre 6)

His W appears to have been replaced by the fear which has some dmg reduction (the amount it reduces could probs go down a fair bit) but he lost his team wide AS buff

Now his bloodscent is probably the main ability that became a bit too overloaded the AS from his W moved here and he can activate blood scent on any champ even if full hp which is a bit OP imo

His R recieved some change but exchanged its point and click (see no counterplay) for some extra range and the ability for it to be blocked/dodged which seems fair

Unlike CertainlyT's usual designs the issue here might be similar to his Zyra design, simply the numbers being too high. But hey thats what PBE is for is tweaking numbers.
